aiplugin.name: msdynaib_TimeManagement
aiplugin.humandescription: Create a time management plan for a workday, given these tasks and priorities priorities . Take into account the meetings already in place for the day meetings and display a breakdown of focus allocations by time. Format response as HTML.
aiplugin.modeldescription: Create a time management plan for a workday, given these tasks and priorities priorities . Take into account the meetings already in place for the day meetings and display a breakdown of focus allocations by time. Format response as HTML.
